verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* gather thyself \w in|strong="H3478"\w* troops, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3117"\w* troops: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w hath|strong="H3478"\w* \w laid|strong="H3478"\w* siege \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* smite \w the|strong="H4480"\w* judge \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rod \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* cheek.

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w*, Beth-lehem Ephrathah, \w which|strong="H3478"\w* art \w little|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* thousands \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Judah, \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* ruler \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* goings \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* everlasting.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* give \w them|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* travaileth \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w forth|strong="H5975"\w*: \w then|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* residue \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brethren \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* return \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \add his flock \add*\w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* strength \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* majesty \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* God: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w abide|strong="H6965"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* great \w unto|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* ends \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \add man \add*\w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H2719"\w* \add our \add*peace: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Assyrian \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w come|strong="H1869"\w* \w into|strong="H2719"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* \w land|strong="H1366"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w in|strong="H6607"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* palaces, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* raise \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w* seven \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* eight principal men.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w waste|strong="H3176"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assyria \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nimrod \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* entrances \w thereof|strong="H7130"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Assyrian, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w cometh|strong="H3068"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* treadeth \w within|strong="H7130"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w border|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* dew \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* showers \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* grass; \w that|strong="H5971"\w* tarrieth \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w man|strong="H5674"\w*, \w nor|strong="H5674"\w* waiteth \w for|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* sons \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* remnant \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* nations, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3027"\w* many peoples, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* forest, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* young lion \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flocks \w of|strong="H3027"\w* sheep: \w who|strong="H3605"\w*, if \w he|strong="H3605"\w* go \w through|strong="H3027"\w*, treadeth \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* teareth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* pieces, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* deliver.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w thine|strong="H3117"\w* hand \w be|strong="H1961"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H1961"\w* above \w thine|strong="H3117"\w* adversaries, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w thine|strong="H3117"\w* enemies \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w it|strong="H3772"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w come|strong="H5892"\w* \w to|strong="H5892"\w* pass \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* day, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w thy|strong="H3772"\w* horses \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* midst \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w thee|strong="H3772"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w thy|strong="H3772"\w* chariots:

\w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H3772"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* throw \w down|strong="H3772"\w* \w all|strong="H3772"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* strong holds:

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* witchcrafts \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* shalt \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \add more \add*soothsayers:

\w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w I|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* cut off \w thy|strong="H7130"\w* graven images \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w thy|strong="H7130"\w* pillars \w out|strong="H5428"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w thee|strong="H8045"\w*; \w and|strong="H5892"\w* thou shalt no more worship \w the|strong="H7130"\w* work \w of|strong="H5892"\w* thine hands.

\w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* pluck \w up|strong="H6213"\w* \w thine|strong="H6213"\w* Asherim \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* midst \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*: \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w destroy|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* cities.
And I will execute vengeance in anger and fury upon the nations which hearkened not.
